name: Fox Jump
description:
This is my very first game! It is a small, yet fairly challenging at times, platformer.   

Features:

There are currently three levels which can be challenging at first must mastered after a few attempts.

There is a "Tries" counter so you can easily track your improvement and set a goal to complete it all in one try.

At the end of the game your total time of completion is displayed.

Note:

All the graphics and sprites are from the SunnyLand assetpack in the Unity Asset Store, though I did have to design the platforms.

The music is Megalovania from UnderTale.

The jumping sound effects were made entirely from scratch along with everything else.

Any feedback will be much appreciated as I am always trying to improve my game development!
